queryName: OSS bucket allows all actions from all principals
descriptionText: OSS buckets must not allow all actions (`*`) from all principals, as this can expose private data or permit unauthorized modification or deletion. This rule inspects the `policy` attribute of `alicloud_oss_bucket` resources to detect such configurations. Specifically, `Effect` must not be `Allow` when both `Action` and `Principal` are set to `*`.
